text: Easter Egg, at least you know it has the shape of an egg, right?
Festivals won't be remembered without celebrations! Let's go and check the place our girls would most likely gather together!
Senpai, have you ever heard of "Darkness Under the Light"?
Maybe someone will try to hide an egg in plain sight?
Easter Egg also has a reserve value, maybe someone will hide it near a trophy because of this?
For the merchants, they might sell something special during this festival…
I'm afraid KongMing is still working… Why don't you go talk with her and relieve her from the job?
